core.ctrl

Class RequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ctrl.Controller
      • core.ctrl.RequestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandHandler, RequestListener, TransferListener

    public abstract class RequestController
extends Controller
implements RequestListener
    Request Controller Responds to transfer requests and performs operations

                         java.lang.String[] commandLineArgs)

        port - - Port to listen for requests on
        commandLineArgs - - Arguments input from the command line
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - - If the socket on the desired port is in use
